an4.24:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava sakete viharati kalakarame.
an4.24:2.1: Yam, bhikkhave, sadevakassa lokassa samarakassa sabrahmakassa sassamanabrahmaniya pajaya sadevamanussaya dittham sutam mutam vinnatam pattam pariyesitam anuvicaritam manasa, tamaham janami.
an4.24:3.1: Yam, bhikkhave, sadevakassa lokassa samarakassa sabrahmakassa sassamanabrahmaniya pajaya sadevamanussaya dittham sutam mutam vinnatam pattam pariyesitam anuvicaritam manasa, tamaham abbhannasim.
an4.24:3.2: Tam tathagatassa viditam, tam tathagato na upatthasi.
an4.24:4.1: Yam, bhikkhave, sadevakassa lokassa samarakassa sabrahmakassa sassamanabrahmaniya pajaya sadevamanussaya dittham sutam mutam vinnatam pattam pariyesitam anuvicaritam manasa, tamaham na janamiti vadeyyam, tam mamassa musa.
an4.24:5.1: Yam, bhikkhave …pe… tamaham janami ca na ca janamiti vadeyyam, tampassa tadisameva.
an4.24:6.1: Yam, bhikkhave …pe… tamaham neva janami na na janamiti vadeyyam, tam mamassa kali.
an4.24:7.1: Iti kho, bhikkhave, tathagato dattha datthabbam, dittham na mannati, adittham na mannati, datthabbam na mannati, dattharam na mannati;
an4.24:7.2: sutva sotabbam, sutam na mannati, asutam na mannati, sotabbam na mannati, sotaram na mannati;
an4.24:7.3: mutva motabbam, mutam na mannati, amutam na mannati, motabbam na mannati, motaram na mannati;
an4.24:7.4: vinnatva vinnatabbam, vinnatam na mannati, avinnatam na mannati, vinnatabbam na mannati, vinnataram na mannati.
an4.24:7.5: Iti kho, bhikkhave, tathagato ditthasutamutavinnatabbesu dhammesu tadiyeva tadi.
an4.24:7.6: ‘Tamha ca pana tadimha anno tadi uttaritaro va panitataro va natthi’ti vadamiti.
an4.24:8.1: Yam kinci ditthamva sutam mutam va,
